title: Operation payload validation of definition <org.eclipse.ditto:HonoCommissioning:1.0.0> for message subject (operation name) <commission>
description: Perform commissioning of new device to enable device connectivity via Eclipse Hono. Please note that the Eclipse Hono 'device-id' and 'auth-id' are derived from the thing-id used in Eclipse Ditto.

tenantId.description: Tenant information for Eclipse Hono; see https://www.eclipse.org/hono/user-guide/device-registry/

optionalAuthId.description: Device specific Auth-Id or empty if another existing Auth-Id will be used; see https://www.eclipse.org/hono/user-guide/device-registry/

optionalPwdHash.description: SHA-512 hashed device password for Eclipse Hono; see https://www.eclipse.org/hono/api/credentials-api/
